solution_line_template: She harvests {basil_per_week} cups of basil every week for {number_of_weeks} weeks for a total of {basil_per_week}*{number_of_weeks} = <<{basil_per_week}*{number_of_weeks}={total_basil_harvested}>>{total_basil_harvested} cups of basil

She needs {basil_needed_per_pesto_cup} cups of basil to make 1 cup of pesto and she has {total_basil_harvested} cups of basil so she can make {total_basil_harvested}/{basil_needed_per_pesto_cup} = {total_pesto_cups} cups of pesto
